name: Double Brick Breaker
description:
The classic game of Breakout/Brick Breaker, with a twist, You play on top and on bottom at the same time!  The game will gradually speed up as you complete levels. Each time you eliminate 7 bricks, your balls will double. Thanks for stopping in, and of course have fun!

Score = 100 points x Number of balls in play

Move with the mouse, press Enter to pause.

Leave some feedback.
